Class RotationTransition

java.lang.Object
it.disi.unitn.transitions.rotation.RotationTransition
public class RotationTransition extends Object
This class performs the rotation.

  • Constructor Details

    • RotationTransition

      public RotationTransition(@NotNull @NotNull String inputFile, @NotNull @NotNull String tempOutDir, @NotNull @NotNull String videoOutDir, @NotNull @NotNull String fname)
      The class's constructor. None of the given values can be null or empty strings.
      Parameters:
      inputFile - The given input file's path.
      tempOutDir - The given temporary output directory's path.
      videoOutDir - The temporary video output directory's path.
      fname - The output file's name.

  • Method Details

    • rotate

      public void rotate(int anchorx, int anchory, double angle, @NotNull @NotNull String text, @NotNull @NotNull String name, @NotNull @NotNull Color color) throws InvalidArgumentException
      This method performs the rotation.
      Parameters:
      anchorx - The x-value of the anchor.
      anchory - The y-value of the anchor.
      angle - The angle expressed in radians.
      text - The text to be writer.
      name - The given output file's name.
      color - The chosen Color instance
      Throws:
      InvalidArgumentException - If one of the non-null arguments is null or an empty string

    • setScale

      public void setScale(@NotNull @NotNull ScalingAlgorithm sws_flags, @NotNull @NotNull String eval, @NotNull @NotNull String interl, @NotNull @NotNull String width, @NotNull @NotNull String height, @NotNull @NotNull String videoSizeID, @NotNull @NotNull String in_range, @NotNull @NotNull String out_range, @NotNull @NotNull String force_original_aspect_ratio, @NotNull @NotNull String inColMatrix, @NotNull @NotNull String outColorMatrix, int force_divisible_by) throws InvalidArgumentException
      This method sets the scaling filter's parameters.
      Parameters:
      sws_flags - The chosen ScalingAlgorithm instance.
      eval - The "eval" parameter's expression.
      interl - The interlacing mode.
      width - The frames' width.
      height - The frames' height.
      videoSizeID - The frames' video size ID.
      in_range - The input color's range.
      out_range - The output color's range.
      force_original_aspect_ratio - This parameter tells the program how to force the aspect ratio. See Scale for more information.
      inColMatrix - The input color's matrix.
      outColorMatrix - The output color's matrix.
      force_divisible_by - An integer value by which the width and the height must be divisible (if set).
      Throws:
      InvalidArgumentException - If any of the given values is null, an empty string or less than or equal to zero

    • setFPS

      public void setFPS(@NotNull @NotNull String fpsEx, int start_time, @Nullable @Nullable String round, @Nullable @Nullable String eof_action) throws InvalidArgumentException
      This method sets the "fps"'s video filter parameters.
      Parameters:
      fpsEx - The framerate expression.
      start_time - The starting instant.
      round - The "round" parameter's value.
      eof_action - The "eof_action" parameter's value.
      Throws:
      InvalidArgumentException - If the given framerate expression is null or an empty string

    • setRotationSpeed

      public void setRotationSpeed(@NotNull @NotNull String rotExpr) throws InvalidArgumentException
      This method allows the program to set the rotation's speed by manipulating the video's timestamps.
      Parameters:
      rotExpr - The given expression. This value must not be null or empty, and it must conform to FFmpeg's setpts and asetpts filters specifications.
      Throws:
      InvalidArgumentException - If the given value is null or empty, or if it does not conform to the given specifications.

    • performRotation

      public void performRotation(long timeout, @NotNull @NotNull TimeUnit tu, @NotNull @NotNull String outfile, @NotNull @NotNull String fileExt) throws Exception
      This method allows the user to create the output video.
      Parameters:
      timeout - The given timeout.
      tu - The given TimeUnit instance.
      outfile - The given output file's path.
      fileExt - The file's extension.
      Throws:
      Exception - If any exception is thrown

    • dispose

      public void dispose() throws IOException
      This method disposes of the underlying objects used in this class.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs
